job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: job summaryltbrgtcraxel has developed breakthrough computer science for bringing unprecedented order to data at any scale we live in the era of exploding data and our customers are suffering from the performance and scale limitations of existing data management software come work on the core team delivering the next generation data platform we are looking for builders that would rather work deep into the technology stack instead of spending their career working on a few new features augmenting software designed years ago if you want to be challenged and work on a high powered team that will help you grow your skills this is the opportunity for you if you want to work on cutting edge tech such as high velocity data indexing distributed consensus for distributed ledger sql query optimization high performance searchable encryption zero trust access control or advanced ui then this is the opportunity for youltbrgt ltbrgtkey job responsibilitiesltbrgtyou will write and test code mostly java in an agile environment you will participate in planning and execution of the product roadmap you will regularly interact with engineering marketing and business leadership you will help customers use and deploy our products to solve really hard problems you may be called on to help our customers create products and services using our platformltbrgtltbrgtqualificationsltbrgtminimum bs in computer science or similar proficiency in java c or c ltbrgtstrong demonstrated skills building softwareltbrgtcuriosity for how software actually works at the lowest levels ltbrgtltbrgtcraxel is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation protected veteran status disability age or other legally protected status
